story.text: There are bad people on the interwebs. Doing bad things, which you don't agree with.
This has always been the case for as long as the web has existed.
You may be able to report bad people to your instance admin, but unless they're doing something illegal there is no guarantee that any further action will be taken.
As a general rule of thumb: move away from bad people and towards good ones.
Find your tribe, or if it doesn't exist then found one. Find the others.
This is the advantage of the federated model. You can be within your tribe, where you feel comfy, but also not completely separated from other tribes.
